name: pEOS
additional_notices: Kindly be aware of liquidity-related risks. This notice is not directed at any project in particular, and is more of a cautionary reminder.

description.en: pEOS enables private and untraceable transactions on EOS. Leveraging ring signatures, ring confidential transactions and stealth addresses pEOS is truly private. It combines Monero's technology with EOS' performance.
